Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.jface.text.source.IVerticalRulerListener

  • Packages that use IVerticalRulerListener 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.jface.text.source
    Provides a framework for connecting document regions with annotations and for displaying those.
    org.eclipse.ui.texteditor
    Provides a framework for text editors obeying to the desktop rules.

      class  SelectAnnotationRulerAction
